# Summon Monster III (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Summoning Spells|summoning]]) \[see text]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Antipaladin Spells|Antipaladin 3]], [[3rd Level Bard Spells|Bard 3]], [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[3rd Level Oracle Spells|Oracle 3]], [[3rd Level Psychic Spells|Psychic 3]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[2nd Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 2]], [[3rd Level Witch Spells|Witch 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, F/DF (a tiny bag and a small candle)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** One summoned creature

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 352

This spell functions like *[[Summon Monster I (Spell)|summon monster I]]**,* except that you can summon one creature from the 3rd-level list, 1d3 creatures of the same kind from the 2nd-level list, or 1d4+1 creatures of the same kind from the 1st-level list.

**Table 10-1: Summon Monster**

|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|

| Eagle\* | — |  |  |  |  | Giant centipede\* | — |  |  |  |  | Aurochs (herd animal)\* | — |
